recipesJson.name: Elvis Eats
recipesJson.author: J_Salts_Nic_Salts
recipesJson.description: This is a spin off the sandwich Elvis made famous that of which the 2 main ingredients are banana and peanut butter. i also am using inw wonder waffle for the carb base. tpa banana fosters is a nice syrupy one part top note joining dx peanut butter iread somewhere that he used to sometimes add strawberry and i thought that was a solid idea also. i then took liberty with a touch of almond to help glue it all together. this is a first shot in the dark i will buld from it.  ok i just noticed that inw wonder waffle isnt on here at all the flavors so in its plac i used inw biscuit at 2% but its really made with inw wonder waffle 2%

reviews.text: I find this recipe very good considering I usually go for creams and custards. It's provides for a well needed break from the usual flavors I vape. It's smooth and well blended and I really enjoy the peanut butter aspect. I did not have wonder waffle by INW, so I used their biscuit as a sub and it turned out very well. Thanks for sharing.
